MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v2 - B2: Evaluation Form - HIS and CVD

age.Description: Age of the participant at visit

CVDCOG.Description: Using your best judgment, do you believe that cerebrovascular disease (CVD) is contributing to the cognitive impairment?

STROKCOG.Description: If there is a stroke, is there a temporal relationship between stroke and onset of cognitive impairment?

CVDIMAG.Description: Is there imaging evidence which supports that CVD is contributing to the cognitive impairment?

CVDIMAG1.Description: If yes, was there imaging evidence of single strategic infarct? (Blank if CVDIMAG ≠ 1)

CVDIMAG2.Description: If yes, was there imaging evidence of multiple infarcs? (Blank if CVDIMAG ≠ 1)

CVDIMAG3.Description: If yes, was there imaging evidence of extensive white matter hyperintensity? (Blank if CVDIMAG ≠ 1)

CVDIMAG4.Description: If yes, was there other imaging evidence? (Blank if CVDIMAG ≠ 1)

CVDIMAGX.Description: If yes, was there other imaging evidence - specify (Blank if CVDIMAG ≠ 1 or CVDIMAG4 = 0)
